title: Can you opt out of 5G internet? - Quora

response.answer_text: i guess you can opt out, but it would mean opting out of the whole mobile, cellular thing, because in a not very long time in the future 4G will become extinct, having all been upgraded to 5G, in the same way as 2G gave way to 3G which gave way to 4G, it progress, and if you ignore all the rubbish being talked about 5G what you will get is a much better and way faster cellular service. it is going to happen with 5G, it is not going to just go away, but if you look at history every radio system ever introduced has had its share of hysterical fear, and we all lived to tell the tale.
“5G internet” does not make sense. 5G and internet are 2 things. If you are worried about 5G, you can keep social distance with any 5G phone (1 meter) and 5G base station (50 meter).
